text: Guilin is one of the most popular tourist destinations in China. It is a city surrounded by fantastic scenery.If you ever visit, make sure to take a cruise down the Li River.桂林的山不是很高；从城市中穿过的河叫漓江，很干净；桂林的米粉好吃又便宜。Guilin is a famous tourist city in China.It is a part of Guangxi Autonomous Region in the south of China.The scenery here is very beautiful, with mountains and rivers. The food is also very cheap.The mountains of Guilin are not very high. The river that passes through the city is called the Lijiang River, which is very clean. The rice noodles in Guilin are delicious and cheap.
